Name: Zoning, 31-17 12th Street Rezoning, Queens (N 230023 ZRQ).
Title: Application number N 230023 ZRQ (31-17 12th Street Rezoning) submitted by 31 17 19 1Z, LLC, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York modifying APPENDIX F, for the purpose of establishing a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area, Borough of Queens, Community District 1, Council District 22.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
